column1: Smoque BBQ////The smell of this place alone gets 5 stars
column2: I just wish it wasn't so middle of nowhere and replaced the so-so smoke shack near my place in LP. I had the brisket and promptly devoured it
column3: the smell and taste had me drooling like Pavlov's dogs. Cole Slaw was so-so
column5: and this place is all about the meat. Damn good cornbread too!
